subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] from my ohio investigation
author: Jody Cupp
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_009A_01C69562.EEB6D150
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Thanks Andrea! They did a great job that night getting their voices heard.
=

There are 3 Cholerea (sp?) victims buried there.  There grave stones show =
them as being adolescents.  Each died 2 weeks apart.  I wonder if some of t=
he kids voices in these files could be them.


  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: Andrea Carr 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, =
June 21, 2006 5:01 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] from my ohio investigation

=


  Jody,



  Those are very clear. The EVP like the "talk to me" sounds l=
ike a child.



  Andrea



  -----Original Message-----
  From: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Jody Cupp
  Sen=
t: Tuesday, June 20, 2006 12:38 PM
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Subject:=
 Re: [EVP-ITC] from my ohio investigation



  I'm just going to post them =
lol and explain them.



  This one I was telling A and L that as soon as I=
 got out of the car I could hear them talking.  Spirit replies "that's a fi=
rst"



  The next one is a forward and reverse I hear  "Is she the one" wi=
th a male voice. In reverse I hear a male voice say "now listen"



  I cou=
ld feel them right on my back most of the time.  This one is one of my cont=
acts.  He must of came with me for the trip.  He says "look at her" at the =
begining, then I talk about how I can feel them piggy backing me.



  The =
next one L is speaking, but directly after I hear a female voice sing "talk=
 to me"



  The next one we were upset about the condition of the grave ya=
rd.  These are monuments of their life here on earth after all.  Spirit say=
s "Once respected" 



  The next one.  I hear a woman whisper in "MY voice=
" say "I can (can't) block her"



  The next one. It sounds like they want=
 the men to go.  "we all feel the men go" then a male voice says "come in" =
we were at the mouth of a trail when this was recorded, that was blocked of=
f to motor vehicles.



    ----- Original Message ----- 

    From: Jody C=
upp 

    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

    Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2006 1:=
06 PM

    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] from my ohio investigation



    Frank,
=

    I asked my contacts to let them know I would be there, the day before.=
  :) I think that helps, to put the energy out of what your intent is, befo=
re you go.



    Jody



      ----- Original Message ----- 

      From: =
Sumption Frank 

      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

      Sent: Tuesday, J=
une 20, 2006 12:49 PM

      Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] from my ohio investigat=
ion



      Those are interesting for a graveyard. I wouldn't think the de=
ad would hang around grave yards, that's why it' not my first choice to rec=
ord at. Gonna have to re-think some of my pre-conceptions!

       Frank


=
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
=

      From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Be=
half Of Jody Cupp
      Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2006 10:22 AM
      To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] from my ohio investigatio=
n

      Here is two more.. LOL.. I need to motivate myself to make the web=
 page. blahh

      Any way.  There was this one Grave that we believed was=
 Elizabeths.  We went over there 3 times and could smell lilacs after awhil=
e.  It wasn't immediate, it just slowly came upon us. There was nothing aro=
und us to create that odor (not even in the woods), so I'm guessing they we=
re sending it to us. When I say "what are these" I was picking up some of t=
hose purple flowers that grow from clover.  They did not produce the scent =
we were smelling!! It was incredible.  I have experienced this before and t=
o me, it means close to the same thing as roses.  A welcoming, of love and =
peace.

      could smell lilac=
s after awhile.  It wasn't immediate, it just slowly 
      came upon =
us. There was nothing around us to create that odor (not even in 
      the=
 woods), so I'm guessing they were sending it to us. When I say "what 
    =
  are these" I was picking up some of those purple flowers that grow from 
=
      clover.  They did not produce the scent we were smelling!! It wa=
s 
      incredible.  I have experienced this before and to me, it mea=
ns close 
      to the same thing as roses.  A welcoming, of love and =

      peace.</SPAN></FONT><O></O><O></O></P></DIV></DIV></DIV></DIV></DIV>=
</DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></DIV>
